finance-kids-1.description: You get ₹10. Do you save ₹5 or spend all?
finance-kids-1.title: Money Bank Story

finance-kids-2.description: Best saver? (a) Spends all, (b) Saves part, (c) Wastes money
finance-kids-2.title: Quiz on Saving

finance-kids-3.description: Tap quickly for "Save" words, avoid "Waste" words
finance-kids-3.title: Reflex Savings

finance-kids-4.description: Match "Piggy Bank → Save, Ice Cream → Spend"
finance-kids-4.title: Puzzle: Save or Spend

finance-kids-5.description: You get birthday gift money. Do you save some?
finance-kids-5.title: Birthday Money Story

finance-kids-7.description: Write: "One thing I saved money for is ___"
finance-kids-7.title: Journal of Saving

finance-kids-8.description: You see candy. Do you buy or save for toy later?
finance-kids-8.title: Shop Story

finance-kids-10.description: Save in 5 scenarios to earn your badge
finance-kids-10.title: Badge: Saver Kid

finance-kids-11.description: You have ₹10. Spend on ice cream now or save for toy?
finance-kids-11.title: Ice Cream Story

finance-kids-12.description: Best spending habit? (a) Buy without thinking, (b) Compare and choose, (c) Borrow for fun
finance-kids-12.title: Quiz on Spending

finance-kids-15.description: You see two pens: one costly, one affordable. Which to buy wisely?
finance-kids-15.title: Shop Story 2

finance-kids-17.description: Write: "One smart thing I bought was ___"
finance-kids-17.title: Journal of Smart Buy

finance-kids-18.description: Offer says "Buy 1, Get 1 Free." Do you need it?
finance-kids-18.title: Candy Offer Story

finance-kids-21.description: You have ₹20. Spend all on candy or plan for 2 days?
finance-kids-21.title: Candy Story

finance-kids-22.description: Test your money planning skills — What is a budget?
finance-kids-22.title: Quiz on Budgeting

finance-kids-23.description: Tap quickly for "Plan Before Spending," not "Spend Instantly."
finance-kids-23.title: Reflex Budget

finance-kids-24.description: Match correctly: Food → Need, Toys → Want.
finance-kids-24.title: Puzzle: Budget Items

finance-kids-25.description: You get ₹100 — Spend all on toys or split for needs and wants?
finance-kids-25.title: Birthday Money Story

finance-kids-26.description: Create or select a poster that promotes budgeting: "Budget Saves Money".
finance-kids-26.title: Poster: Plan First

finance-kids-27.description: Write: "One time I planned money use was ___."
finance-kids-27.title: Journal of Budgeting

finance-kids-28.description: You get ₹50 for the fair. Spend all on toys or plan for food also? → Plan wisely.
finance-kids-28.title: School Fair Story

finance-kids-29.description: Tap quickly: choose Plan to save money or avoid overspending.
finance-kids-29.title: Reflex Money Plan

finance-kids-30.description: Create 3 small budgets to earn the Budget Kid quiz badge.
finance-kids-30.title: Badge: Budget Kid

finance-kids-31.description: You have ₹20. Do you buy ice cream or book for class? → Book.
finance-kids-31.title: Ice Cream vs School Book Story

finance-kids-32.description: Which is a need? (a) Food, (b) Fancy toy, (c) Chocolates). Correct = Food.
finance-kids-32.title: Quiz on Needs

finance-kids-33.description: Tap for Shoes for school, for 10th toy car.
finance-kids-33.title: Reflex Need vs Want

finance-kids-35.description: You want chips, but need lunch. Correct choice? → Lunch.
finance-kids-35.title: Snack Story

finance-kids-37.description: Write: "One need I always spend on is ___."
finance-kids-37.title: Journal of Needs

finance-kids-38.description: You get gift money. Should you spend on toy or save for shoes? → Shoes.
finance-kids-38.title: Gift Money Story

finance-kids-39.description: Tap for Food, for Extra Ice Cream.
finance-kids-39.title: Reflex Smart Pick

finance-kids-40.description: Choose needs correctly 5 times to earn the Needs First Kid quiz badge.
finance-kids-40.title: Badge: Needs First Kid

finance-kids-41.description: Parents take you to bank. Do you watch and learn or play outside? → Watch and learn.
finance-kids-41.title: Bank Visit Story

finance-kids-42.description: What is a bank? (a) Toy shop, (b) Place to keep money safe, (c) Ice cream shop). Correct = Place to keep money safe.
finance-kids-42.title: Quiz on Banks

finance-kids-44.description: Match Deposit → Safe, Loan → Borrow, ATM → Withdraw.
finance-kids-44.title: Puzzle: Bank Uses

finance-kids-45.description: You get gift money. Do you keep at home or put in bank? → Bank.
finance-kids-45.title: Savings Story

finance-kids-47.description: Write: If I go to bank, I want to ___.
finance-kids-47.title: Journal of First Bank Visit

finance-kids-48.description: Parent shows ATM card. Do you learn or ignore? → Learn.
finance-kids-48.title: ATM Story

finance-kids-50.description: Learn 5 bank basics to earn the Bank Explorer quiz badge.
finance-kids-50.title: Badge: Bank Explorer

finance-kids-51.description: You borrow a pencil from a friend. Do you return it? → Yes.
finance-kids-51.title: Pencil Story

finance-kids-52.description: What's borrowing? (a) Taking without asking, (b) Using and returning, (c) Stealing). Correct = Using and returning.
finance-kids-52.title: Quiz on Borrowing

finance-kids-53.description: Tap for Return Borrowed, for Keep Forever.
finance-kids-53.title: Reflex Borrow/Steal

finance-kids-54.description: Match Book Borrowed → Return, Toy Borrowed → Share.
finance-kids-54.title: Puzzle: Borrow Match

finance-kids-55.description: You borrow friend's lunch. Do you return/share next day? → Yes.
finance-kids-55.title: Lunch Box Story

finance-kids-57.description: Write: "One thing I borrowed and returned was ___."
finance-kids-57.title: Journal of Borrowing

finance-kids-58.description: Friend lends toy. Do you keep safe or break it?
finance-kids-58.title: Toy Story

finance-kids-59.description: Tap quickly: Ask Permission or Grab.
finance-kids-59.title: Reflex Borrow Right

finance-kids-60.description: Return borrowed items 5 times to earn the badge.
finance-kids-60.title: Badge: Good Borrower

finance-kids-61.description: You plant a seed; it grows into a tree. Money can grow the same way ?” Save or Waste? → Save.
finance-kids-61.title: Tree Story

finance-kids-62.description: What grows money? (a) Savings + Interest (b) Spending all (c) Wasting). Correct = Savings + Interest.
finance-kids-62.title: Quiz on Growth

finance-kids-63.description: Tap quickly: Save & Grow for right choice, avoid Spend All.
finance-kids-63.title: Reflex Investment Basics

finance-kids-65.description: Compare piggy bank vs bank savings: which keeps money safe and helps it grow? → Bank account.
finance-kids-65.title: Bank vs Piggy Bank

finance-kids-66.description: Create or select a poster showing Invest = Grow.
finance-kids-66.title: Poster: Grow Your Money

finance-kids-67.description: Write: If I invest ₹100, I want it to grow into ___.
finance-kids-67.title: Journal of Growth

finance-kids-68.description: Buy toy today or save to buy bicycle later? → Save.
finance-kids-68.title: Toy vs Saving Story

finance-kids-69.description: Tap for Interest Earned, not Money Lost.
finance-kids-69.title: Reflex Growth Check

finance-kids-70.description: Choose growth over spending 5 times to earn the Money Gardener quiz badge.
finance-kids-70.title: Badge: Money Gardener

finance-kids-71.description: You set up a lemonade stand. Earn ₹50. Smart or waste? → Smart.
finance-kids-71.title: Lemonade Story

finance-kids-72.description: How do you earn? (a) By working, (b) By wasting, (c) By sleeping). Correct = By working.
finance-kids-72.title: Quiz on Earning

finance-kids-73.description: Tap for Work → Earn, for Waste → Nothing.
finance-kids-73.title: Reflex Work vs Play

finance-kids-74.description: Match Farmer → Crops, Teacher → Knowledge, Shopkeeper → Goods.
finance-kids-74.title: Puzzle of Jobs

finance-kids-75.description: You help in family shop. Is this earning experience? → Yes.
finance-kids-75.title: Helping Parents Story

finance-kids-77.description: Write: One way I can earn money is ___.
finance-kids-77.title: Journal of Earning

finance-kids-78.description: You care for neighbor's pet. Earn small money. Is it work? → Yes.
finance-kids-78.title: Pet Sitting Story

finance-kids-79.description: Tap for Bake & Sell, for Buy & Waste.
finance-kids-79.title: Reflex Small Business

finance-kids-80.description: Show 5 ways of earning to earn this badge.
finance-kids-80.title: Badge: Young Earner

finance-kids-81.description: Shopkeeper charges ₹20 instead of ₹10. Do you check bill? → Yes.
finance-kids-81.title: Candy Shop Story

finance-kids-82.description: Who is honest? (a) Gives correct change, (b) Cheats customer, (c) Lies). Correct = Gives correct change.
finance-kids-82.title: Quiz on Honesty

finance-kids-83.description: Tap for Check Bill, for Ignore.
finance-kids-83.title: Reflex Scam Alert

finance-kids-84.description: Match Fair Shop → Trust, Cheat Shop → Loss.
finance-kids-84.title: Puzzle: Honest vs Fraud

finance-kids-85.description: Stranger offers free toy for address. Correct action? → Refuse.
finance-kids-85.title: Stranger Story

finance-kids-87.description: Write: One way I can avoid being cheated is ___.
finance-kids-87.title: Journal of Safety

finance-kids-88.description: Seller says Hurry or lose toy! Do you check price first? → Yes.
finance-kids-88.title: Toy Shop Story

finance-kids-89.description: Tap for Ask Price, for Trust Blindly.
finance-kids-89.title: Reflex Check First

finance-kids-90.description: Identify 5 scam tricks to earn the badge.
finance-kids-90.title: Badge: Scam Spotter Kid

finance-kids-91.description: You find ₹5 on floor in class. Do you keep or give teacher? → Give teacher.
finance-kids-91.title: Lost Coin Story

finance-kids-92.description: Which is honest? (a) Stealing, (b) Returning money, (c) Hiding). Correct = Returning money.
finance-kids-92.title: Quiz on Money Honesty

finance-kids-94.description: Match "Return Money → Good, Keep Secretly → Wrong."
finance-kids-94.title: Puzzle of Honesty

finance-kids-95.description: Friend drops ₹10. Do you return? → Yes.
finance-kids-95.title: Friend's Money Story

finance-kids-96.description: Create or select a poster saying "Be Fair with Money."
finance-kids-96.title: Poster: Honesty Pays

finance-kids-97.description: Write: "One time I used money honestly was ___."
finance-kids-97.title: Journal of Ethics

finance-kids-98.description: Shopkeeper gives extra change. Do you return? → Yes.
finance-kids-98.title: Shop Story

finance-kids-100.description: Handle 5 honest money cases to earn the "Honest Kid" quiz badge.
finance-kids-100.title: Badge: Honest Kid
